Text.Page:
We're still having problems with the {@LinkCreature:22#14#vadoma acolytes} at the academy. I'd like you to hunt them down and collect proof of death.

When you're done, report to Thara. She'll have your reward.

These girls came to us to find someone who'd empower them, teach them to fight for the right things. Now they're dead.

I'll pay you, but I won't thank you.
It's not pretty, but the vadoma acolytes must be stopped. You'll have to do it.
